    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public static rx.Observable<DeviceConnection> connect(Context context,
                                                      String clientId,

        Convenience to connect to the last known cached device, not forcing a fresh device scan.
        See Also:

      • connect

        public static rx.Observable<DeviceConnection> connect(Context context,
                                                      String clientId,
                                                      String redirectUri,
                                                      boolean forceFreshChoice)
        Attempt to make a connection with My Vinli. The returned Observable can be flatmapped to any My Vinli device capabilities exposed by the DeviceConnection interface. It is important to note that this Observable will immediately emit an error if the My Vinli app is not installed, so it is advisable to use isMyVinliInstalledAndUpdated(Context) and launchMarketToMyVinli(Context) to handle this scenario in advance.
        Parameters:
        clientId - OAuth Client ID of the application requesting a connection.
        redirectUri - OAuth redirect URI of the application requesting a connection.
        forceFreshChoice - Forces My Vinli to initiate a Bluetooth scan of nearby devices and make a fresh choice rather than automatically connecting to the last known device. It may be helpful to set this to true in response to a user action explicitly requesting a fresh choice.

      • isMyVinliInstalledAndUpdated

        public static boolean isMyVinliInstalledAndUpdated(Context context)
        Check whether or not My Vinli is currently installed. If this returns false, My Vinli must be installed before a DeviceConnection will be available. In this scenario, it is advisable to call launchMarketToMyVinli(Context) in response to direct user interaction, such as a dialog requesting that the user install My Vinli.
        See Also:
        createMyVinliInstallRequestDialog(Context)

      • launchMarketToMyVinli

        public static void launchMarketToMyVinli(Context context)
        Launch a market Activity for installation of My Vinli. It is best to call this in response to direct user interaction after isMyVinliInstalledAndUpdated(Context) returns false, such as in a dialog requesting that the user install My Vinli.
        See Also:
        createMyVinliInstallRequestDialog(Context)

      • createMyVinliInstallRequestDialog

        public static AlertDialog createMyVinliInstallRequestDialog(Context context)
        Convenience for creating an AlertDialog that prompts the user to install My Vinli. it is the caller's responsibility to call Dialog.show() on the returned AlertDialog.

      • isBluetoothEnabled

        public static boolean isBluetoothEnabled(Context context)
        Helper to quickly and safely determine if the default Bluetooth adapter is enabled.
